items.title: The Evolving Spectrum of Energy Sources
items.snippet: Press Release:Press Information Bureau PIB Headquarters The Evolving Spectrum of Energy Sources Posted On: 28 FEB 2026 11:01AM by PIB Delhi Every day, as lights turn on across homes, schools, farms, factories, and hospitals, we rarely think about where that energy comes from. The fan that cools a classroom, the pump that waters a field, and the train that carries passengers all depend on a vast and carefully managed …
